definition: soft lump or unevenness in a yarn, to remove the burls from cloth
details:
noun
- soft lump or unevenness in a yarn
= synonyms: knot
- a large rounded outgrowth on the trunk or branch of a tree
- the wood cut from a tree burl or outgrowth
verb
- to remove the burls from cloth
= example: to remove the burls from cloth
